mainText:
I would just like to say that Steve was the reason I loved apple. I just 
became an appleite about three years ago and have been hooked ever 
since. From getting my first iPod to forcing my mom to get an iPhone 
to getting my first mac which I love like a baby. Steve was a brilliant 
man and will forever be part of history. He will forever be the face of 
Apple. He is truly and amazing person. He is my hero.
author: Sam
